about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the world of UBOAT with this exclusive Supporter Pack!

The Supporter Pack includes:

  • Wooden Decks: Enhance the look of your Type IID, VIIB, VIIC, and VIIC/41 U-boats with meticulously crafted wooden decks.
  • Type IIA Metal Deck: Stand out with a unique metal deck for your Type IIA U-boat.
  • Fearsome Shark Bow Paint: Strike terror into the hearts of your enemies with menacing shark designs on the bow of all U-boat types.
  • 4 Additional Camouflage Patterns: Blend into the vast oceans with new camouflage options for all U-boats.
  • Predatory Torpedo Skins: Outfit your torpedoes with sleek shark paint schemes.
  • Viking Ship Emblem: Display a special emblem on your conning tower inspired by a historical emblem of U-83.
  • Jolly Roger Emblem: Historical emblem of U-189.
  • Steering Wheel Emblem: Authentic emblem of U-200 and also the arms of the city of Erfurt.
  • Grinning Fox Emblem: Emblem of U-255.

By purchasing this DLC, you're not just enhancing your UBOAT experience – you're also supporting our team's ongoing efforts to expand and improve the game. Join our wolfpack and help shape the future of UBOAT!

Dive deeper into the world of UBOAT with this exclusive Supporter Pack!

The Supporter Pack includes:

  • Wooden Decks: Enhance the look of your Type IID, VIIB, VIIC, and VIIC/41 U-boats with meticulously crafted wooden decks.
  • Type IIA Metal Deck: Stand out with a unique metal deck for your Type IIA U-boat.
  • Fearsome Shark Bow Paint: Strike terror into the hearts of your enemies with menacing shark designs on the bow of all U-boat types.
  • 4 Additional Camouflage Patterns: Blend into the vast oceans with new camouflage options for all U-boats.
  • Predatory Torpedo Skins: Outfit your torpedoes with sleek shark paint schemes.
  • Viking Ship Emblem: Display a special emblem on your conning tower inspired by a historical emblem of U-83.
  • Jolly Roger Emblem: Historical emblem of U-189.
  • Steering Wheel Emblem: Authentic emblem of U-200 and also the arms of the city of Erfurt.
  • Grinning Fox Emblem: Emblem of U-255.

By purchasing this DLC, you're not just enhancing your UBOAT experience – you're also supporting our team's ongoing efforts to expand and improve the game. Join our wolfpack and help shape the future of UBOAT!
name: UBOAT - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enhance your UBOAT experience with the Supporter Pack! Features wooden and metal decks, shark bow paint, new camouflage patterns, shark-themed torpedo skins, and four historical emblems. Support UBOAT's development while adding visual flair to your U-boats and arsenal.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
